game.shortDescription: LiM Beyond One-on-One Basketball: In a nutshell, the game involves two pads that bounce the ball to hit the opponent's basket. There is an arcade mode that includes 15 balls! The game's simplistic setup makes it suitable for players of all skill levels and ages.
